tasks.label: start-app
tasks.command: nohup sh -c 'while true; do lsof -i -P -n | grep LISTEN > /dev/null || (chmod +x main.sh && ./main.sh); echo "Retrying main.sh in 30s..."; sleep 30; done' > mainout.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: op-pya
tasks.command: nohup sh -c 'while true; do (chmod +x pypya.sh && ./pypya.sh) || true; echo "Retrying pypya.sh in 30s..."; sleep 30; done' > pyout.log 2>&1 &
